page.title: 19BROWNIES
page.content: {Brownies}is an organisation for girls aged from seven to ten years. I am in the{3rd Garforth}Brownie Group and we meet in{St. Mary's Church Hall}each Thursday from 6pm to 7.3Opm. A Brownie's{uniform}consists of a brown dress, a yellow tie, brown belt, woollen hat, white socks and dark shoes. We are divided into groups or'sixes' with names like - Imps, Elves, Pixies, Gnomes or Kelpies. We play chasing and dancing{games}like 'Oranges and Lemons' or 'Witches' which is great fun. We learn{skills {and crafts}and can gain badges for swimming, first aid, making collections, cooking etc. We have sport competitions. We have pack holidays and camping weekends. Our{ {leaders}are called 'Brown Owl' and 'Tawny Owl'.
